marklogic.body: What about the Princeton study where rats were fed HFCS and sucrose. The HFCS rats actually were given less sugar syrup and rapidly began getting fat. The Sucrose syrup consuming rats had more sugar to eat and did not have the rapid weight Gain. Look it up but "where there is smoke there is fire" and one just can not keep ignoring the smoke. Do you really think some one is just "conspiring" against you corn industry .... Let's get real here, there is a problem.
